this game has made me financially struggle for 1341 hours now, dont start playing unless u are a billionaire. bad idea if u broke school student.

This is my first ever PC game ever and it is the game that brought me to PC gaming. However, it went downhill over the last couple of years. There's atleast one hacker in a casual server and there are tons of smurfers. I don't recommend this game.

Good game but community isn't the greatest all the time. Hard to find decent people/players that won't blame you for everything but overall the game itself is good. I don't really like the new changes to skins and certain maps but its whatever. Custom games and making maps can be really fun too. :D

You know what, i gotta say that this game truly changed my perspective on life. Gripping, shocking, mesmirising - this game captivated all my emotions. I can happily say that id reccomend this game to any person out there trying to change there life.
If you want anger issues, play this game.
excelente jogo que porém há muitos hackers cuidem disso

Well made competetive fps, regularly updated with lots of community content tho not enough of it on the official servers.
Sometimes has a cheater problem but not as much as it used to.

Pros:
Great gun play
Lots of guns to choose from
Good Amount of gamemodes
Easy to get into/good at

Cons:
Some cheaters about
lack of map variety on official servers
matchmaking can be slow even with all maps selected
frag grenades tend not to frag.

Overall pretty decent sticking mostly to the classic style cs has been for years.

русофобов, руинеров, нубов,просто челов которые в 4 грозят тебя кикнуть и которые буду издеваться над тобой
Не спорю есть шанс получить нормальный тиммейтов но он не большой

This game is really fun, and is one of the only games I have over 100 hours (on steam) in as I mostly play minecraft, fortnite and the odd other game that isn't on steam. I would really recomend as I can never get enough of it and am always wanting to play more and more.
